title: Dropbox
description: A connector that allows for fetching data from your Dropbox storage. Please note that this connector is in aplha and is limited by the access token's expiry.

token.title: Access Token
token.description: The generated access token from your Dropbox App Console. [Here's](https://dropbox.tech/developers/generate-an-access-token-for-your-own-account) steps to generate one.
